name: Extendago Woocommerce
author: Arture B.V.

sections.description:
Extenda GO Connect, developed and maintained by Arture, makes it simple. No duplication of work, but a central place for your product management. Manage your products, stock and discounts at one place and our plugin will do the magic. Order received in Woocommerce? Our plugin will create the order in ExtendaGO and also handle the stock events.

In our plugin, various settings offer the possibility to set the processing as desired.

Extenda GO POS platform is operated and managed by ExtendaRetail. ExtendaRetail owns the platform to operated the POS in a Cloud environment. This includes management of products, stocks, and discounts. To use our app it is necessary to have an ExtendaGO account.
sections.installation:
1. Install our plugin.
  2. Activate our plugin
  3. Enter your ExtendaGO credentials on the ExtendaGO settings page
  4. Setup your import settings
  5. Add the 3 cronjobs commands in your server.
  6. Existing Woocommerce shop? Export all your products into ExtendaGo
  7. Manage all your products, stocks and discounts in ExtendaGO and our plugin will do the magic.
  8. That’s all.
